description.plain:
Jonathan Groff is an American actor and singer who was part of the original Broadway casts of Spring Awakening and Hamilton. He received Tony Award nominations for both those works and won a Grammy Award for the Hamilton cast recording. He also starred in the 2015 off-Broadway revival of A New Brain.

On screen, he is best known for his voice work as Kristoff in Frozen, his guest starring role as Jesse St. James on Glee, and his leading role in HBO’s Looking. He is currently starring in Netflix’s Mindhunter.

body.plain:
Jonathan Groff is an American actor and singer who was part of the original Broadway casts of Spring Awakening and Hamilton. He received Tony Award nominations for both those works and won a Grammy Award for the Hamilton cast recording. He also starred in the 2015 off-Broadway revival of A New Brain.

On screen, he is best known for his voice work as Kristoff in Frozen, his guest starring role as Jesse St. James on Glee, and his leading role in HBO’s Looking. He is currently starring in Netflix’s Mindhunter.

songs.full_title: What Comes Next? by Jonathan Groff
songs.title: What Comes Next?

description.plain:
King George returns to comment on the action again, implacably reprising his musical theme from “You’ll Be Back,” note for note and sometimes even lyric for lyric. It’s almost like he doesn’t want to admit he was wrong…

Historically, the Battle of Yorktown was the last major battle of the revolution, and finally convinced the British parliament to vote to end the war.

King George wrote:

I cannot conclude without mentioning how sensibly I feel the dismemberment of America from this empire, and I should be miserable indeed if I did not feel that no blame on that account can be laid at my door, and did I also not know that knavery seems to be so much the striking feature of its inhabitants that it may not in the end be an evil that they will become aliens to this kingdom.

Translation: I had nothing to do with this, these Americans are all hoodlums, and we’re probably better off without them anyway.

Our version of King George is basically singing “lol good luck with that.”

songs.lyrics:
95 ContributorsTranslationsEspañolWhat Comes Next? Lyrics[King George]
They say
The price of my war's not a price that they're willing to pay
Insane
You cheat with the French, now I'm fighting with France and with Spain
I'm so blue
I thought that we'd made an arrangement
When you went away
You were mine to subdue
Well, even despite our estrangement, I've got
A small query for you:

What comes next?
You've been freed
Do you know how hard it is to lead?

You're on your own
Awesome. Wow
Do you have a clue what happens now?
Oceans rise
Empires fall
It's much harder when it's all your call
All alone, across the sea
When your people say they hate you
Don't come crawling back to me
You might also likeYou're on your own…12Embed

songs.full_title: I Know Him by Jonathan Groff
songs.title: I Know Him

description.plain: This last reprise of “You’ll Be Back” shows King George becoming incredulous at the election of John Adams as the United States' second president, and gleeful at what he expects to be the resultant collapse of its government.

songs.lyrics:
115 ContributorsTranslationsEspañolI Know Him Lyrics[KING GEORGE]
They say
George Washington's yielding his power and stepping away
‘Zat true?
I wasn't aware that was something a person could do
I'm perplexed
Are they gonna keep on replacing whoever's in charge?
If so, who's next?
There's nobody else in their country who looms quite as large…
A sentinel whispers in King George's ear

John Adams?!
I know him
That can't be
That's that little guy who spoke to me
All those years ago
What was it, eighty-five?
That poor man, they're gonna eat him alive!
Oceans rise
Empires fall
Next to Washington, they all look small
All alone
Watch them run
They will tear each other into pieces
Jesus Christ, this will be fun!
You might also likeDa da da dat da dat da da da da ya da
Da da da dat dat da ya daaaaa!
Hahahahahahahahaha
“President John Adams”
Good Luck18Embed

songs.full_title: Lost in the Woods by Jonathan Groff
songs.title: Lost in the Woods

description.plain: Once again left alone by Anna (voiced by Kristen Bell) as she goes chasing after Elsa (voiced by Idina Menzel), Kristoff (voiced by Jonathan Groff) expresses his feelings of frustration at not being needed. His reprise of “Reindeers Are Better Than People” segues into this song that imitates the harmonies and sound of a 1980s rock ballad, with Kristoff being backed by Sven and the other reindeer (all voiced by Groff).

songs.full_title: Não Sei Onde Estou by Raphael Rossatto
songs.title: Não Sei Onde Estou

songs.lyrics:
22 ContributorsLost in the Woods Lyrics[Verse 1]
Again, you're gone
Off on a different path than mine
I'm left behind
Wondering if I should follow
You had to go
And of course, it's always fine
I probably could catch up with you tomorrow

[Pre-Chorus]
But is this what it feels like
To be growing apart?
When did I become the one
Who's always chasing your heart?

[Chorus]
Now I turn around and find
I am lost in the woods
North is south, right is left
When you're gone
I'm the one who sees you home
But now I'm lost in the woods
And I don't know what path you are on
I'm lost in the woods

[Verse 2]
Up 'til now
The next step was a question of how
I never thought it was a question of whether
Who am I if I'm not your guy?
Where am I if we're not together
Forever?
You might also like[Chorus]
Now I know you're my true north
'Cause I am lost in the woods
Up is down, day is night
When you're not there
Oh, you're my only landmark
So I'm lost in the woods
Wondering if you still care

[Bridge]
But I'll wait
For a sign (For a sign)
That I'm your path
'Cause you are mine (You are mine)
Until then
I'm lost in the woods

[Outro]
Lost in the woods (Lost, lost)
In the woods, in the woods (Lost in the woods)
I'm lost in the woods
Lost in the woods (Lost, lost)
(I'm lost)
I'm lost in the woods7Embed
